attributes.action: Stop businesses discriminating against those without a vaccine passport
attributes.additional_details: Because the Nuremberg trial outcome still stands. No medical procedure should be mandated. By coercing and manipulating businesses into requiring a vaccine passport you are discriminating against unvaccinated people via businesses. Everyone should have a choice what enters their body. All businesses should have a choice who they serve without being penalised and manipulated by the government. Any business that refuses to serve an unvaccinated person should be penalised for discrimination.
attributes.background: Make vaccine passports an option rather than mandatory. Create legislation that prevents businesses discriminating against non-vaccinated people. Ensure businesses serve everyone irrespective of whether they have been vaccinated or not or be penalised for discrimination.
